i go to college part time.

it takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy laughing, so I often visit comedy clubs in my free time.
I often take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.
I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!
I have had a history of anxiety and depression, but I am managing it well with therapy and medication.
I was bullied for being overweight as a child.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!
That's great! I love dogs. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a goldendoodle. She's a great dog and I love her to death.
I've heard great things about goldendoodles! They're supposed to be really friendly and easy to train.
Yeah, she's really good. She's a great listener and she's always happy to see me.
It sounds like you have a great dog!
I do. I'm really lucky to have her.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to laugh, so I often visit comedy clubs in my free time.
That's awesome! I love going to comedy clubs too.
I also like to crochet. I'm not very good at it, but it's a fun hobby.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to crochet.
It's not too hard to learn. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
